attributes.action: Brexit - it’s time to walk away and take the ‘no deal’ option
attributes.additional_details: EU negotiators are consistently proving that Britain will be punished for its democratic vote to leave the Union. Despite concessions, the ability to progress and discuss significant issues such as trade is delayed as the demands for more cash is seen as pre-requisite to achieving the wishes of the British people. We should call an immediate end to this indignation and walk away from these one sided threats and demands - let’s return to being Great Britain again and lead the way by walking away!
attributes.background: Britain was once a great and proud nation with determination, grit and resolve of past generations to conquer the aggression of dictators to become a world power. The threats, bullying, aggression and intimidation of Junker, Barnier et al has shown that now is the time to reclaim our pride and walk
